original: 漢嘉人，歷仕劉焉、劉璋、劉備。正史上雖記載甚少，但無論仕於劉璋、劉備，都頗受重用。及至蜀漢後期蔣琬問張休推薦人才時，仍享有高譽。
text: Han Jiaren, Liu Yan, Liu Zhang, Liu Bei. Although there are few records in official history, both Liu Zhang and Liu Bei are highly used. When Jiang Wan asked Zhang Xiu to recommend talents in the later period of the Shu Han Dynasty, he still enjoyed a high reputation.
